pr_title: MULE-18047: Add the component that generated a cursor provider (support/4.2.2)

timeline.message:
MULE-18047: Add the component that generated a cursor provider (#8679) (#9101)

(cherry picked from commit faaaf99c38bedf9f49304ed7cd9014e765b444f8)
(cherry picked from commit 6383cc2fd7713b2dff2705b7f83b3d149bf3c146)

MULE-18634: Fix originating ComponentLocation (#9187) (#9210)

(cherry picked from commit bcbae88a89a24bca533b96a1503a3b97ecc983f6)
(cherry picked from commit 45ed738c7e8d7d86ac5521d2a29ccd46ff322b29)

timeline.author: elrodro83

replies.bodyText: This was an old code that wasn't removed by mistake.  The cursor provider is set with this flag when instantiated (eg https://github.com/mulesoft/mule/blob/fix/MULE-18047/core-tests/src/test/java/org/mule/runtime/core/internal/streaming/bytes/TroubleshootCursorStreamProviderTestCase.java#L53)
replies.author: szaffarano
